text: Pen gapman bɨnonɨm Helod, ne bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok kɨlop suk agak. Bɨ kɨli Mosis takaw ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨgtep gep okok, kɨlop abe suk agak. Yislel bɨawl anɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop suk agek, apelak agak, Bɨ God nop aglup ak, binɨb okok kɨlop dɨl kod yenɨgab agak. Bɨ anɨb ak, nop tɨkɨnɨgabal man akal agak?
